title: Promote a Story on Social Media
description: A social media editor needs to promote a newly published investigative report across Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram.

tasks.description: Select the most compelling quote or statistic from the report to use as a hook.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a powerful, shareable piece of information from the article.

tasks.description: Draft a unique post for each platform, tailoring the language and format (e.g., a Twitter thread, a Facebook post, an Instagram story).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates three distinct, platform-appropriate posts.

tasks.description: Schedule the posts to be published at optimal engagement times.
tasks.expected_outcome: The posts are scheduled for publication.
